page.title: 08Ecology.
page.content: Our block is in a conservation area. It is what the politicians might call a green belt, and there are lots of things in it which people today fight to conserve. Some of these things are footpaths; canals and animals and birds. At least one of the declining species of bird is in our block,that is the barn owl. We cannot be sure it has a nest but we do know it is present because not long ago we found about twelve pellets and studied them in school to find out what the owl had been eating. As our village is near the sea we do not get much snow because the salt air quickly melts it.
